prompt:
<script type="text/javascript"> <var input= window.prompt("please enter your name"); document.write(input); </script>

Function checks whether the input is correct. If not, it displays a message until it is right. function validateForm()
{ var x = document.forms["myForm"]["fname"].value;
 if(x=="")
{ alert("name must be filled out");
 return false; }
 }
